member.name: D2D1_PROPERTY
member.summary: Specifies the indices of the system properties present on the interface for an .

member.name: D2D1_PROPERTY.D2D1_PROPERTY_INPUTS
member.summary: The names of the effect's inputs.

member.name: D2D1_PROPERTY.D2D1_PROPERTY_CACHED
member.summary: The output of the effect should be cached.

member.name: D2D1_PROPERTY.D2D1_PROPERTY_PRECISION
member.summary: The buffer precision of the effect output.

member.name: D2D1_PROPERTY.D2D1_PROPERTY_MIN_INPUTS
member.summary: The minimum number of inputs supported by the effect.

member.name: D2D1_PROPERTY.D2D1_PROPERTY_MAX_INPUTS
member.summary: The maximum number of inputs supported by the effect.
